div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
SEV1 - Critical
Complete service outage
Data breach or security incident
Over 50% of requests failing
Response: Immediate, all-hands

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
SEV2 - High
Significant quality degradation over 20% drop
Major feature broken
Cost spike over 200% normal
Response: Within 1 hour, primary team

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
SEV3 - Medium
Minor quality issues
Elevated latency
Partial feature degradation
Response: Within 4 hours, business hours

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
SEV4 - Low
Cosmetic issues
Non-critical bugs
Response: Next business day

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
TRIGGER: Quality score drops
over 15% for over 10 minutes

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 1: ASSESS — 0-5 min
Check quality dashboard for affected dimensions
Identify if degradation is global or segment-specific
Review recent deployments, last 24h
Check external dependencies like OpenAI status

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 2: MITIGATE — 5-15 min
If recent deployment: Rollback
If external dependency: Switch to fallback model
Enable degraded mode, cached responses
If rate limiting: Scale up workers
Enable request shedding for non-critical traffic

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 3: COMMUNICATE — 15-30 min
Update status page
Notify affected customers if user-facing
Post in #incidents Slack channel
Page additional responders if needed

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 4: RESOLVE — 30+ min
Identify root cause
Implement fix with proper testing
Deploy fix through normal pipeline
Verify quality scores recovered
Update status page: resolved

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 5: POST-MORTEM — 24-48h
Schedule blameless post-mortem
Document timeline and actions
Identify what worked and what did not
Define action items to prevent recurrence
Add regression test cases
Update runbooks if needed
